guiSET.core

Class ScrollArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.Control
      • guiSET.core.Container
        • guiSET.core.ScrollArea

  • public class ScrollArea
extends Container
    A Container that allows both horizontal and vertical scrolling if the content exceeds the ScrollAreas size. It does not layout its content as VScrollContainer or VScrollContainer but keeps the relative x and y positions of the items.
    Author:
    Mc-Zen
